file.name: carbon_black_app_control.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    tmp0:
      properties:
        clVersion: {type: string}
        createdBy: {type: string}
        createdByUserId: {type: string}
        dateCreated: {type: string}
        dateModified: {type: string}
        description: {type: string}
        fileCatalogId: {type: string}
        fileName: {type: string}
        fileRuleType: {type: string}
        fileState: {type: string}
        forceInstaller: {type: string}
        forceNotInstaller: {type: string}
        hash: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        idUnique: {type: string}
        lazyApproval: {type: string}
        modifiedBy: {type: string}
        modifiedByUserId: {type: string}
        name: {type: string}
        origIdUnique: {type: string}
        platformFlags: {type: string}
        policyIds: {type: string}
        reportOnly: {type: string}
        reputationApprovalsEnabled: {type: string}
        sourceId: {type: string}
        sourceType: {type: string}
        unifiedFlag: {type: string}
        unifiedSource: {type: string}
        version: {type: string}
        visible: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp1:
      properties:
        json: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp2:
      properties:
        json: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp3:
      properties:
        json: {type: string}
      type: object
  securitySchemes: {}
info:
  contact: {email: frikky@shuffler.io, name: '@frikkylikeme', url: 'https://twitter.com/frikkylikeme'}
  description: Automated generation of VMware Carbon Black App Control
  title: VMware Carbon Black App Control
  version: 1.0.0
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  tmp0:
    post:
      description: Create/edit rule or change file state by hash.
      parameters:
      - description: Hash of file to update File State.
        example: 64a4f54d6863d59f1121a91554b55e9a
        in: query
        name: Hash
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: File state for hash, defaults to 3 which is banning the hash.
          1 = Un-approve, 2 = Approve.
        example: '3'
        in: body
        name: File State
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Comma Separated list of Policy IDs to add banned hash to. 0 for
          global rule.
        example: 10,11
        in: query
        name: Policy IDs
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp0'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: VMware Carbon Black App Control Change File Rule By Hash
  tmp1:
    post:
      description: Change publisher state
      parameters:
      - description: Publisher ID
        example: '12'
        in: query
        name: Publisher ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: 'Publisher State. Options: 1=Unapproved, 2=Approved, 3=Banned,
          4=Approved by Policy, 5=Banned by Policy'
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: Publisher State
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp1'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: VMware Carbon Black App Control Change Publisher State
  tmp2:
    post:
      description: Upload a file
      parameters:
      - description: Id of computer from which to upload the file. if 0, system will
          find the best computer to get the file from
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: Computer ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Id of fileCatalog entry for file to upload
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: File Catalog ID
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Upload priority in range [-2, 2], where 2 is highest priority.
          Default priority is 0
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: Priority
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Status of upload. Status of upload in progress can be changed
          to 5 (Cancelled). Any upload can be changed to 6 (Deleted)
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: Upload Status
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp2'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: VMware Carbon Black App Control File Upload
  tmp3:
    post:
      description: Search query by object and conditional string
      parameters:
      - description: Type of object to query, choose among approvalRequest, certificate,
          computer, connector, event, fileCatalog, fileInstance, fileInstanceDeleted,
          fileInstanceGroup, fileRule, fileUpload, internalEvent, meteredExecution,
          notifier, pendingAnalysis, policy, publisher, serverConfig, serverPerformance,
          updater. See README for more details.
        example: event
        in: query
        name: Object Type
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Param query found in https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/7.2/rest-api/#query-condition,
          use a new line for each query desired. see README for more details.
        example: fileName:test1.exe|test2.exe
        in: query
        name: Query
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Field name to group by
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Group
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Field name to sort by
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Sort
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Offset in query results
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: Offset
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Maximum number of results to return. When 0 or not present, all
          results will be returned. When -1, only count will be returned.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Limit
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp3'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: VMware Carbon Black App Control Search
tags:
- {name: Endpoint Security & Management}

Error: parse: paths: tmp0: post: operation "": parameters: parse parameter "File State": unsupported parameter type "body"
